text: Mark Warwick Fordham Speight (6 August 1965 â€“ 7 April 2008) was a British television presenter. He was best known for showing what was the long-running BBC children's art program, SMart. He found his fiancee, Natasha Collins, also a BBC presenter, dead in their flat in London in January 2008. He was then arrested as a suspect, but was released without any charges put against him. On 13 April 2008, police found his body hanging from the roof of the MacMillan House in London. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:English television presenters Category:People from Staffordshire Category:Suicides by hanging in the United Kingdom Category:1965 births Category:2008 deaths
title: Mark Speight
